name: They Wait for you Beneath the Velvet Sky
name_original: They Wait for you Beneath the Velvet Sky
description:
An empty beach.

An elusive ghost.

A short walking simulator.

Wander the beach, listen to the waves, read some notes.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look
  • E to read and close notes
  • ESC to quit

Presented in spectacular 640x480
